title: Serve
intro: We are a church family, and we need different people to help our family thrive. If you are part of St John's, we encourage you to join and serve one of our teams.

teams.name: Welcome and Hospitality
teams.description: Our welcome and hospitality team create the family environment we love at St John's Park. They welcome people at the door, serve refreshments, and make sure everyone receives a warm welcome.

teams.name: Park Kids Team
teams.description: Our Park Kids team disciples the youngest generation in our church, from under-5s through primary-aged children.

teams.name: Park Youth Team
teams.description: We disciple young people through Sunday Bible study and our midweek youth group Cornerstone, helping them meet and grow in relationship with Jesus.

teams.name: Worship
teams.description: Our worship team helps us encounter God's presence and give him praise.

teams.name: Food Bank
teams.description: Our Food Bank team serves local people in crisis, providing food parcels and a listening, friendly ear.

teams.name: Lunch Club
teams.description: Our lunch club team helps serve lunch and build relationships in this richly diverse, lively community.

teams.name: Cleaning
teams.description: Our cleaning team enables us to welcome people into the building during the week and gather together on Sundays.

teams.name: Admin
teams.description: Our admin team helps with the day-to-day running of the church. This involves helping with buildings, applying for grants, and staying on top of paperwork.

teams.name: Creative
teams.description: Our creative team uses photography, social media, and video to show what God is doing locally and help people connect with church family.

teams.name: Audio-Visual Team
teams.description: Our audio-visual team helps make sure everyone can see and hear clearly during Sunday gatherings.

outro_html: Interested in joining a team? Please get in touch.

join_team.title: Join a Team
join_team.intro: Select the teams you are interested in, then share your contact details. We will follow up with next steps.

hero_image.alt: Church volunteers and friends smiling together outdoors

join_team.hero_blurb: Serving is one of the best ways to build friendships and help church family thrive each week.

steps.select_intro: Choose as many teams as you like.
